name: Fireball
castMessages: {user} hurls a blazing sphere of fire!

name: MagicMissile
castMessages: Three darts of glowing blue energy streak toward the target.

name: IceSpike
castMessages: A jagged shard of ice forms in the air and launches forward.

name: ThunderClap
castMessages: The air booms with a deafening crack of thunder!

name: DrainLife
castMessages: A dark, wispy tendril siphons energy from the target.

name: Smite
castMessages: A pillar of righteous light descends from the ceiling!

name: AcidSplash
castMessages: {user} flings a bubble of corrosive green liquid.

name: VampiricTouch
castMessages: {user}'s hand glows with a sickly purple light as they reach out.

name: ArcaneBlast
castMessages: Pure magical pressure erupts around the target!

name: Scorch
castMessages: A sudden burst of intense heat flares up under the target.

name: HolyNova
castMessages: An explosion of light both harms the foe and mends {user}'s wounds.

name: Blizzard
castMessages: Freezing winds and heavy slush pummel the area.

name: ChainLightning
castMessages: A jagged bolt of electricity arcs through the air!

name: GreaterHeal
castMessages: A brilliant radiance washes away {user}'s injuries.
